text: Saint-Cyr-l'École is a commune in the western suburbs of Paris, France. It is 21.4 km (13.3 mi) from the center of Paris. In 2006, about 16,365 people lived here. == Education == From 1993 to 1996, the main campus of the Service d'exploitation de la formation aéronautique was in the commune. Category:Communes in Yvelines
title: Saint-Cyr-l'École
